theAlchemist:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theAlchemist:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theAlchemist:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theAlchemist:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theAlchemist:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theAlchemist:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theAlchemist:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theAlchemist:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theAlchemist:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theAlchemist:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theAlchemist:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSki.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theAlchemist:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSki.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !theAlchemist:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
